1: cing//bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// 'dig rten rnams kyi ngana song gsum//sbyong bar byed pa'i 'jum bstan nas//tshangs pa'i gsung ni snan pa yis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang
2: ste//lag na rdo rje stobs po ch// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa//legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang//lag na rdo rje khyod legs so//'grol pha ma'i don du khyod//snying rje che dang ldan gyur cing//
3: 'dam dpal ye shes sku yi mtshan //yang dag brjod pa don che ba//dag par byed cing sdig sel ba//ngo las mnyan par brtson pa ni//gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so//ne phyir 'di nings
4: bshadg bya//khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon//bcoms ldan de ni legs shes gsol//lan gyi gsung tshigs su bcad pa drug go//de nas bcom ldan sha gkya thub//gsang sngags mtha' dag
5: rigs chen po//gsang sngags rig pa chang ba'i rigs//rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs/ 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang//phyag rgya tshan
6: po'i rigs mchog dang//gtsug tor chen po'i rigs chen no//rigs drug la gzigs pa'i tshigs su bcad ba gnyis soa///gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing//gnyis su med par 'byung
7: ba dang// skye ba med pa'i cshos can 'di// tshig gi bdag pos tshiogs bcad gsungs//a a'a ai aAM bu Au ae ae o+o aematHa shi to tre di dzwAan murti ra ha bud+obud+ha nim ta d+wa btI ni/ao bdza uA+ha
